rules.name: MSSA_or_SOW_not_checked
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 9) OR ((3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND (10))
rules.label: MSSA or SOW not checked

fields.fieldText: The SOW Status field should be equal to PSOPs Approved prior to Approval Submission. Please request Services Ops to approve the SOW in OP4I/ OpenAir
